update FUN_COMP
CRM_COMP_ID = #{crmCompId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

YOUJIA_DEPT_CUSTMAXSHARE_RENT = #{youjiaDeptCustmaxshareRent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPEN_MICRO_PROGRAM_STATUS = #{openMicroProgramStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
WX_END_TIME = #{wxEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WX_PAY_TYPE = #{wxPayType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
MICRO_PROGRAM_VERSION = #{microProgramVersion,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ERP_SYSTEM_NAME = #{erpSystemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERP_SYSTEM_ICON = #{erpSystemIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

APP_SYSTEM_START_FIGURE = #{appSystemStartFigure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_TYPE = #{packageType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
KA_DEPT_TOTAL_NUMS = #{kaDeptTotalNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KA_DEPT_NUMS = #{kaDeptNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KA_PACKAGE_TYPE = #{kaPackageType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_OPEN_FDD = #{isOpenFdd,jdbcType=TINYINT},
IS_SYNC_FDD_DATA = #{isSyncFddData,jdbcType=TINYINT},
COMP_DEPTS_NUM = #{compDeptsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

IS_OPEN_SALE_QUAN = #{isOpenSaleQuan,jdbcType=TINYINT},
FIRST_DEPT_FORM_TIME = #{firstDeptFormTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

FIRST_IN = #{firstIn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
OPEN_PARTNER = #{openPartner,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ORGANIZATION_TYPE = #{organizationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAIN_COMP = #{mainComp,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

= #{openOnlineContract,jdbcType=TINYINT}, COMP_MANAGEMENT_MODEL = #{compManagementModel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUSTOMIZED_TYPE = #{customizedType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FIRST_IN = #{firstIn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROPERTY_TYPE = #{propertyType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, OPEN_PARTNER = #{openPartner,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ORGANIZATION_TYPE = #{organizationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAIN_COMP = #{mainComp,jdbcType=TINYINT} where COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update FUN_COMP set BRAND_ID = null where BRAND_ID = #{brandId}
update FUN_COMP set DEPT_STATUS = -2, UA_ID = null where COMP_ID = #{compId}
update FUN_COMP set COMP_TYPE = #{softType} , TRACK_TIME = #{nowTime} where COMP_ID = #{compId}
update FUN_COMP set DEPT_STATUS = #{deptStatus} where COMP_ID = #{compId} and DEPT_STATUS = -2
UPDATE FUN_COMP SET COMP_DEPTS=ISNULL(COMP_DEPTS, 0) + 1 WHERE COMP_NO = #{compNo}
mapper.select: select B.COMP_NAME, B.COMP_NO, C.SHARE_ID from FUN_COMP_JOIN A left join FUN_COMP B on A.SUB_COMP_NO = B.COMP_NO left join FUN_SHARE_RELEVANCE C on C.SHARE_COMP_NO = B.COMP_NO where A.SUB_COMP_NO = #{compNo} and A.FLAG = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE FUN_COMP SET FIRST_IN = #{firstIn} WHERE COMP_ID = #{adminCompId}
mapper.select: select A.SUB_COMP_NO AS COMP_NO, C.COMP_CNAME, B.SHARE_ID from FUN_COMP_JOIN A LEFT JOIN FUN_SHARE_RELEVANCE B ON A.SUB_COMP_NO = B.SHARE_COMP_NO and B.FLAG=1 LEFT JOIN FUN_COMP C ON A.SUB_COMP_NO = C.COMP_NO where a.MAIN_COMP_NO=#{compNo} and A.FLAG=1

SELECT DISTINCT FC.COMP_CNAME,FC.COMP_CONTACT,FC.CONTACT_PHONE,FSC.SNAME,FC.COMP_NO,FSR.CREATE_TIME,1 ORD FROM FUN_COMP FC LEFT JOIN FUN_SHARE_RELEVANCE FSR ON FSR.SHARE_COMP_NO=FC.COMP_NO AND FSR.FLAG=1 LEFT JOIN FUN_SHARE_COMP FSC ON FSC.ID=FSR.SHARE_ID WHERE FC.COMP_NO = #{compNo} UNION SELECT DISTINCT FC.COMP_CNAME,FC.COMP_CONTACT,FC.CONTACT_PHONE,FSC.SNAME,FC.COMP_NO,FCJ.CREATE_TIME,0 ORD FROM FUN_COMP FC LEFT JOIN FUN_COMP_JOIN FCJ ON FCJ.SUB_COMP_NO=FC.COMP_NO AND FCJ.FLAG=1 LEFT JOIN FUN_SHARE_RELEVANCE FSR ON FSR.SHARE_COMP_NO=FCJ.SUB_COMP_NO AND FSR.FLAG=1 LEFT JOIN FUN_SHARE_COMP FSC ON FSC.ID=FSR.SHARE_ID WHERE FCJ.MAIN_COMP_NO=#{compNo} AND FCJ.SUB_COMP_NO != #{compNo} ORDER BY ORD DESC

SELECT COMP_NO,FC.COMP_CNAME,FC.COMP_CONTACT,FC.CONTACT_PHONE,FC.COMP_ADDR FROM FUN_SHARE_RELEVANCE FSR LEFT JOIN FUN_COMP FC ON FSR.SHARE_COMP_NO=FC.COMP_NO WHERE FSR.SHARE_ID=#{shareId} AND FSR.FLAG=1 ORDER BY CASE COMP_NO WHEN #{compNo} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
